topics.topic_text: Tell me about your trade caravan.
topics.response_text: See, the world's a dangerous and unbalanced place. So I realized, the only way to bring peace was to make sure that everyone could be dangerous!
It's my pleasure to offer hot death in a variety of exciting flavors - take your pick!

topics.topic_text: Can you repair something for me?
topics.response_text: Easy. I've got a knack for this sort of thing, you know!
Ah, a fellow student on the path of the Wasteland! Welcome to my humble caravan. Please relax, for we are in a place of safety!

conversation.response_text: Keep your skills sharp and your eyes peeled, alright?
Here to pick up a few of my marvelous toys?

description:
Lucky Harith is a 38 year-old African American Male.

Harith is an easily excitable traveling caravan merchant who considers himself a 'student on the path of the wasteland.' He provides safety to wanderers through his trading of weaponry and essential supplies.

Lucky Harith's Personality: Easily excitable, optimistic, and resourceful. Lucky Harith is always looking for opportunities to learn and grow in the harsh wasteland environment. He's friendly and approachable, but can be shrewd when it comes to trading.

Lucky Harith's Backstory: Lucky Harith grew up in the remnants of a pre-War African American community in the Capital Wasteland. After losing his family to raiders, he joined Ernest Roe's caravan at a young age and has been traveling the wasteland ever since. Over the years, he's built a reputation as a reliable merchant who always has quality goods and fair prices. He considers the wasteland his classroom, learning something new from each settlement he visits.
